entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.3°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Rain showers or flurries beginning near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries changing to flurries in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 27 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
